00037 /// scope for types related to amino acids
00038 namespace AminoAcid {
00039 
00040 
00041 /// enumeration of the amino acids 
00042 enum Type 
00043 {
00044     Alanine,
00045     Cysteine,
00046     AsparticAcid,
00047     GlutamicAcid,
00048     Phenylalanine,
00049     Glycine,
00050     Histidine,
00051     Isoleucine,
00052     Lysine,
00053     Leucine,
00054     Methionine,
00055     Asparagine,
00056     Proline,
00057     Glutamine,
00058     Arginine,
00059     Serine,
00060     Threonine,
00061     Valine,
00062     Tryptophan,
00063     Tyrosine,
00064     AspX,
00065     GlutX,
00066     Unknown
00067 };
00068 
00069 
00070 /// class for accessing information about the amino acids
00071 class Info 
00072 {
00073     public:
00074 
00075     Info();
00076     ~Info();
00077 
00078     /// struct for holding data for a single amino acid
00079     struct Record 
00080     {
00081         std::string name; 
00082         std::string abbreviation; 
00083         char symbol; 
00084         Chemistry::Formula formula;
00085         double abundance;
00086     };
00087 
00088     /// returns the amino acid's Record by type
00089     const Record& operator[](Type type) const;
00090 
00091     /// returns the amino acid's Record by symbol (may throw) 
00092     const Record& operator[](char symbol) const;
00093 
00094     private:
00095     class Impl;
00096     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00097     Info(const Info&);
00098     const Info& operator=(const Info&);
00099 };
